## Installation

You can install the development version of gslSpatial with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("JoleneSutton/gslSpatial")
```

## Overview
gslSpatial provides tools to assist with spatial analysis of in the Gulf of St. Lawrence Region.

Descriptions of available functions, data, and stored shapefiles are [here](https://jolenesutton.github.io/gslSpatial/reference/index.html).
